notes: Brand new or recently renovated apartment in excellent condition with modern finishes throughout â€” light wood laminate flooring, sleek L-shaped kitchen with induction cooktop, built-in oven, and ample cabinetry (still has protective film on cabinets), plus a modern bathroom with bathtub, smart toilet, and stylish vanity.
